sentence.Network_en: Don't just maunder about: do some work!
sentence.Network_cn: 别光闲荡了,做点正经事吧!

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: perhaps from obsolete maunder 'to beg'

means.word_mean: 2. talk indistinctly; usually in a low voice
3. speak (about unimportant matters) rapidly and incessantly
